member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations
member.summary: Options for controlling the fixed state of an annotation object

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.None
member.summary: (0)The object is not fixed. The object will move and scale accordingly when the container scrolls or zooms.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.Scrolling
member.summary: (1)The object location is fixed. The object will only scale when the container scrolls or zooms but will not change position.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.Zooming
member.summary: (2)The object size is fixed. The object will only move when the container scrolls or zooms but will not scale.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.FontSize
member.summary: (4)Fix the font size of the annotation object. Any text that is part of this object will be drawn using its original point value regardless of the current container scale value.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.StrokeWidth
member.summary: (8)Fix the stroke of the annotation object. Any line that is part of this object will be drawn using its original pixel size regardless of the current container scale value.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnFixedStateOperations.LengthValue
member.summary: (16)Fix the length part of the annotation object. For example, the ruler object will draw the tick marks as fixed if LengthValue was specified as part of the object's fixed operations (default).
